_header: Jesu that diedest on the rood

TCD70.Transcription:
Jhesu þat diedist on þe rodeTo fede mannus soule wiþ
                    heuenli fodeAnd now hast fedde us hereÞou make us able þee
                    to serueÞat in helle hungur we neuere sterueffro þe
                    siȝt of þi face so clere& þat þis boone þus
                    grauntid mai ben Amen

BLHar2339.First Lines: Ihesu þat diedist on þe rodeTo fede mannys soule with heuenli fode…
BLHar2339.Last Lines: …And freelnes of þe flesch so britilAnd felnes of þe feende
